H0.text: what network is showing the monday night football game. NBC

H1.text: what network is showing the monday night football game. CBS

H2.text: what network is showing the monday night football game. FOX

H3.text: what network is showing the monday night football game. ESPN

A4.text: It originally ran on ABC from 1970 to 2005, before moving exclusively to sister network ESPN from 2006 to 2019.

A5.text: After MNF was awarded to ESPN and Sunday Night Football was acquired by NBC in 2006, the Wild Card doubleheader that had aired on ABC, as well as a share of the rotating rights to the Super Bowl, was also given to NBC.
